messages.title: Support for Lib Dems surges
messages.content: Millions switch to back Jo Swinson. People across Britain are backing the Liberal Democrats to deliver a brighter future for our country and keep Scotland in both the EU and the UK.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stop Brexit. Stop independence. Build a brighter future.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to keeping Scotland in the UK and Europe.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Education - a vital investment for the future
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pledging to close the education gap and ensure every child has access to high-quality education.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting our environment, tackling the climate crisis
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans to work with the EU to set high environmental standards and work together to protect the planet and achieve a carbon-neutral economy.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Making our NHS fit for the future
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring NHS has resources it needs, reform mental health services, tackle the GP crisis and promote good health and wellbeing.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting for a fair deal for Aberdeen City & Shire
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Seeking better deals from Scottish and UK Governments for local funding and fair share of funds.

mentions.candidate: James Oates has the experience to be a powerful voice for Gordon.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Support for the Liberal Democrats in Aberdeen City & Shire has increased while the Conservatives and Labour are losing votes.

issues.brexitEurope: Only James Oates and the Liberal Democrats are committed to keeping Scotland in the UK and the UK in the European Union.
issues.education: On the SNP’s watch, 150,000 college places have been cut and the budget has been cut, causing an expansion of nursery education at a snail’s pace.
issues.environment: Working with the EU enables us to set high environmental standards and work together to protect our planet.
issues.governance: Fighting for a fair deal for Aberdeen City & Shire for local funding from the Scottish and UK Governments.
issues.health: James Oates and the Liberal Democrats are committed to giving our NHS the resources it needs to transform mental health services.

housing.content: Liberal Democrat Leader, Jo Swinson, said: 'We will stop Brexit and turn our attention to building more homes, improving education for our children, properly funding our NHS, and putting in emergency measures to address the climate crisis.'

leaflet.personalStatement: James Oates has the experience to be a powerful voice for Gordon. A leader with experience as a government adviser for the Treasury and investment companies such as J.P. Morgan, Robert Fleming and UBS.

politicalExperience.achievements: Experience working with investment companies such as J.P. Morgan, Robert Fleming and UBS.

images.caption: James Oates - a powerful voice for Gordon
A brighter future for our country
